price: 66 C’est, au contraire, Allah seul que tu dois adorer. Sois donc de ceux qui se montrent reconnaissants. »
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهَ فَٱعۡبُدۡ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلشَّٰكِرِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: bali al-laha fa-uʿ'bud wakun mina al-shākirīna
